description.message: Require `noopener` (and `noreferrer`) on `a` and `area` element with target="_blank"

hrefNotSpecified.description: Debug information to show when the href is not specified

isSameOrigin.description: Debug information to show when the origin is the same

noTargetBlankFound.description: Debug information to show when the target="blank" is not found

shouldHaveRel.description: Report message to show when the validation fails
